content: THE QUOTABLE ALEX an artist: "Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life." Who said this quote about art and its cleansing effect on the soul?

This quote, "Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life," is often attributed to the renowned Spanish painter Pablo Picasso. However, there is some debate about whether he was the actual originator of this phrase. Some sources suggest that it might have been said by Italian painter and sculptor Michelangelo. Nonetheless, the sentiment resonates strongly with the idea that art has the power to purify and rejuvenate the human spirit by offering an escape from the mundane and the ordinary.
